comment:
По клику на статую сервитора баркает Паскаль
AmarnathFinalBattleTruth+1 
одноразовый

languages.text: "Странно. На броне этого почтенного скитария я вижу отметины от когтей сервоклешни".
"This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."
languages.original_text: "Странно. На броне этого почтенного скитария я вижу отметины от когтей сервоклешни".

traits.locale_text: "This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."
"This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."
"This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable skitarii's armour."
"This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable skitarii's armour."
"This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."
"This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."

languages.text: 「これは妙だ。サーヴォクロウの爪痕がこの尊いスキタリの鎧に残るとは」
languages.original_text: "This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."

traits.locale_text: 「これは妙だ。サーヴォクロウの爪痕がこの尊いスキタリの鎧に残るとは」

languages.text: “很奇怪，这位可敬的护教军的盔甲上，有伺服利爪所留下的抓痕。”
languages.original_text: "This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."

traits.locale_text: “很奇怪，这位可敬的护教军的盔甲上，有伺服利爪所留下的抓痕。”

languages.text: « C'est étrange. L'armure de ce vénérable Skitarius porte des marques de servo-griffes. »
languages.original_text: "This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."

traits.locale_text: « C'est étrange. L'armure de ce vénérable skitarii porte les marques de servo-griffes. »

languages.text: «Qué extraño. La armadura de este venerable Skitarius tiene marcas de arañazos de una servogarra».
languages.original_text: "This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."

traits.locale_text: «Qué extraño. Esta venerable armadura Skitarii tiene marcas de arañazos de una servogarra».

languages.text: "Merkwürdig. Ich sehe Kratzspuren von einer Servo-Klaue auf der Rüstung dieses verehrten Skitarius."
languages.original_text: "This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."

traits.locale_text: "Merkwürdig. Ich sehe Kratzspuren von einer Servo-Klaue auf der Rüstung dieses verehrten Skitarii."

languages.text: "Bu çok tuhaf. Muhterem Skitarius'un zırhında hizmopençelerin bıraktığı çizikler görüyorum."
languages.original_text: "This is odd. I see scratch marks from a servo-claw on this venerable Skitarius's armour."

traits.locale_text: "Bu çok tuhaf. Muhterem Skitarius'un zırhında, hizmopençeler tarafından yapılmış çizikler görüyorum."
